name: Stuff for Kids Online Trivia | Topics for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: Music: What kind of instrument is a flute?
questions.explanation:
Woodwind.

	A flute is, usually, a metal woodwind instrument. It is played to the side instead of the front of the body.

questions.text: Movies: Who is the actor who played Harry Potter in the movie "Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets"?
questions.explanation:
Daniel Radcliffe.

	This exciting movie was derived from the book of the same name by author J. K. Rowling. Daniel Radcliffe played Harry Potter in all eight films of the series.

questions.text: Hobbies: What do color do you get when you mix yellow and blue coloured paint?
questions.explanation:
Green.

	Blue and yellow mixed together make green. Red and white make pink, red and yellow make orange and red and blue make purple.

questions.text: Animals: What kind of animal is a zebu?
questions.explanation:
Cattle.

	Zebu are a type of humped cattle sometimes called a Brahma. They are found mostly in southeast Asia. They have droopy ears and a large dewlap.

questions.text: Geography: What American state did I travel to if I went to see the Grand Canyon?
questions.explanation:
Arizona.

	The Grand Canyon state is Arizona. It became a state park in 1919. It is one of the most visited state parks in the US.

questions.text: Literature: Which of the choices below is the name of a character in the Dr Seuss book "Green Eggs and Ham"?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	In Dr. Seuss' book "Green Eggs and Ham" Sam (or Sam-I-Am) is a character who tries to get the book's hero to eat green eggs and ham. The story has only 50 words.

questions.text:
Sports: Who was the quarterback of the New England Patriots (NFL) in their win in 
Super Bowl LIII?
questions.explanation:
Tom Brady.

	Quarterback Tom Brady has won at least six superbowls. He has appeared in at least nine. He is one of the greatest quarterbacks to play in the NFL.

questions.text: Hobbies: What kind of food is pilaf?
questions.explanation:
Rice.

	Pilaf is a spiced rice dish. It is often served with various types of meat.

questions.text: Science: Which planet turns in the opposite direction to the planets in the rest of the solar system?
questions.explanation:
Venus.

	The planet of Venus turns the opposite way to the other planets. This means that on Venus the Sun rises in the west and sets in the east. Scientists debate the reason for this anomaly.

questions.text: Geography: What is the capital of Peru?
questions.explanation:
Lima.

	The city of Lima is one of the largest in the Americas. It is the capital of Peru and home to the National University of San Marcos, the oldest university in the Americas being founded in 1551.
